body:
(i) add new version
(ii) add OCE, PETSc and SLEPc as dependencies
(iii) fix Blas/Lapack configuration
(iv) disable internal Metis which does not compile

Tested on macOS with `spack install gmsh+petsc+mpi+slepc+oce ^petsc@3.6.4+boost ^boost+python+mpi ^slepc@3.6.3`.

fixes https://github.com/LLNL/spack/issues/1129

@jppelteret
title: Gmsh -- various fixes
